description: Detailed drawings of new switch and socket plates, and new light fittings to decorative spaces (written and photograph schedule, including reference to samples inspected by us on-site); Precise locations in State Rooms and front of house circulation spaces, of new switch and socket plates and other exposed M and E fittings such as fire detection and call points (room plans and elevations at 1:20 or marked-up photographs as agreed); New exposed radiators (internal part elevations at 1:20, plus product design details or marked-up photographs as agreed); Detailed proposals for the retention, reuse or disposal of historic sanitary ware, fixed joinery items and historic radiators (detailed written and photographic schedule, with plans and internal elevations or marked-up photographs as agreed as applicable to demonstrate new locations and methods of integration); Details of new secondary glazing pursuant to Condition 5 (a, b, c, f, o [Groups A and C only]) of listed building consent dated 11th March 2020 (RN:19/06963).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
